introduction: I'm a 7th-semester Computer Science and Engineering student at IIT Dharwad, I have experience programming in Python, C, C++ and Rust a strong interest in solving challenging problems
During my internships at Arista Networks and Quantrium Tech, I gained practical experience in backend software development, networking, and deploying solutions using Docker
I have experience leading team projects, including creating a Bus Tracking Application without specialized GPS equipment and an innovative Kepler Exoplanet Classification system

education.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Dharwad
education.description: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

work.name: Arista Networks
descriptions: Tested and validated networking features such as Multi-Layer Switches, VxLAN, and MLAG
The internship involved devising and executing 14 product tests, demonstrating the compatibility of three key features
Installed and Executed the tests on existing Arista Proprietary Software & Hardware
Learnt about ensuring the reliability and performance of network solutions

work.name: Quantrium
descriptions: Created an Authentication and Authorization frameowrk for APIs, and deployed using Docker
Used FastAPI, MongoDB, Docker, and Kafka to enhance web application efficiency
Adapted to various project management tools such as Jira, Confluence, and Bit-Bucket

projects.title: NWKRTC Bus-Tracking
projects.summary: Bus Trackig Application for Govt. of Karnataka
description: Led a team to create an end-to-end bus tracking application without use of specialized GPS devivce
The application was deployed on 1000+ buses, and the app has 500+ users
Used technologies such as Redis, NGINX and Docker to create a scalable solution

projects.title: Grow-Simplee Delivery App
description: Created a device to perform anamoly detection on an item using OpenCV and Tensorflow
Optimized delivery route algorithm using multi-processing (17s to 1s)
Won Bronze medal at Inter IIT Tech Meet 11.0 held at IIT Kanpur

projects.title: Kepler Exoplanet Classification
projects.summary: Classification of Exoplanets using orbit data from NASA's Kepler Space Telescope
description: Random Forest Classifier for exoplanets with precision of 0.82 and F1-score 0.52
Made a web-app using Streamlit to visualize the data and results
Led a team of 5 and Won 1st place at Summer of Innovation 2022 held at IIT Dharwad

projects.title: DPP Caching Algorithm
projects.summary: Online Caching with Fetching cost for Arbitrary Demand Pattern
description: An AI assisted caching algorithm that uses a neural network to predict future demand
The algorithm was tested on real-world data and showed a 10% improvement in performance
Conference paper selected for presentation at ICASSP 2023, Greece

projects.title: TruPen
description: An examination system capable of handling multiple subjects, teachers and students
A quiz system with various types of answering mechanisms, with performance tracking of students
A team project built with HTML, CSS, JS, PHP and MySQL

projects.title: Martian Atmos
projects.summary: Martian soil analysis using data from NASA's Curiosity Rover
description: Analyzed mass spectrometry data from the Curiosity Rover to determine the composition of Martian soil
Used data buckets and multi-class neural networks to predict organic molecules with an accuracy of 72%
Won 1st place at Summer of Innovation 2023 held at IIT Dharwad

projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.summary: Application to manage employees in an organization
description: The application can track interns and employees and assign mentors to interns
Ability to assign projects to interns, track their progress and provide feedback
Built using React, FastAPI and MySQL

projects.title: Drone Dash
description: Built a drone navigation algorithm using a combination of Backtracking and Dijkstra's Algorithm
Used technologies such as ROS, PX4 autopilot, Gazebo and Python
Won 2nd place at Summer of Innovation 2023 held at IIT Dharwad
